hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Do the prostration properly and do not put your forearms flat with elbows touching the ground like a dog. And if you want to spit, do not spit in front, nor to the right for the person in prayer is speaking in private to his Lord

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُصَلِّي يُنَاجِي رَبَّهُ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ
chapter.eng-name: A person in Salat (prayer) is speaking in private to his Lord (Allah)
